synonyms: kṛṣṇa—of Lord Kṛṣṇa; nāma—the holy name; guṇa—the qualities; yaśa—the fame; avataṁsa—ornaments; kāṇe—on the ear; kṛṣṇa—of Lord Kṛṣṇa; nāma—of the holy name; guṇa—of the qualities; yaśa—of the fame; pravāha—waves; vacane—in Her talking.
translation: "Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī's earrings represent the name, fame and qualities of Lord Kṛṣṇa. The glories of Lord Kṛṣṇa's name, fame and qualities are always inundating Her speech.
